description.value:
This snare drum and sticks are made from dark wood, and the skin is fine antelope hide. This drum grants you a +2 item bonus to Performance checks while playing music with the instrument.

Activate—Prestissimo 2 (auditory, concentrate, manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You play the snare with an extreme cadence. You and all allies within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened] condition until the end of your next turn and can use the extra action each round for only Step and Stride actions.

Activate—Larghissimo 2 (auditory, concentrate, manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You play the snare with a lassitude that drains the speed from your foes. Enemies within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:34|showDC:all|options:area-effect,inflicts:slowed,inflicts:off-guard|traits:auditory] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 2} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is slowed 2 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] for 1 round.
